metadataAttributes.Title: Managerial Economics and Business Analysis  Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Business Tools for Successful Execution. Apply economic theory and analytical tools to make effective business decisions.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Economics, Supply And Demand, Statistical Analysis, Statistical Hypothesis Testing, Consumer Behaviour, Cost, Externality, Game Theory, Market (Economics), Interest Rate, Supply Chain, Data Analysis,
